title: Real Estate Acquisitions VA
job_overview:
Real Estate Acquisitions VA – Up to $10/hr plus Bonuses – Experienced Real Estate Closers Only

If you’re a real estate closer with a proven track record, tired of dead-end VA jobs and looking for a true career role with high earning potential, this is for you.

Description:
We are a U.S. based real estate investment company hiring a Acquisitions Virtual Assistant with proven experience making offers to home owners, negotiating, closing real estate deals, and guiding them through the contract signing process.

This is a high-level remote role. You must understand real estate terminology, be confident on the phone, great work ethic, coachable, and know how to follow a sales script while sounding natural. Only apply if you’ve personally made offers to homeowners to buy their properties, negotiated, and closed real estate contracts over the phone.

Compensation:
Base Pay: $10/hour USD

Bonuse Structure:
- Up to $2,000/month in tiered contract bonuses (3 signed = $750, 4 = $1,250, 5+ = $2,000)
- Quarterly consistency bonuses up to $2,000 for top performers (hit your tier 3 months in a row)
- High performers regularly earn $3,000+ per month with base and bonuses.
- All contracts must be company owner-approved and realistic.

Schedule: 
Full-time, Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM CST
Pay Dates: 1st and 15th of each month

What You’ll Be Doing:
- Call homeowners (seller leads)  and build authentic rapport
- Follow a proven script while sounding natural and confident
- Ask strong follow-up questions to uncover motivation and condition
- Make verbal offers and negotiate price and terms
- Walk sellers through the purchase agreement and get it signed over the phone via docusign
- Handle objections and push deals forward
- Keep all detailed notes, offers, and seller updates organized in our CRM
- Collaborate closely with our team

You Must Have:
- Minimum 2 years of experience in real estate acquisitions or seller negotiations
- Experience closing real estate deals and getting contracts signed
- Excellent English communication skills (spoken and written)
- Proven ability to build trust and rapport over the phone
- Good attitude, confident, friendly, and persuasive communication style, not robotic
- Familiarity with terms like ARV, repairs, inspection, contingencies, etc.
- Comfortable with CRM tools and outbound dialers
- Fast internet, reliable computer, and quiet workspace

You Should NOT Apply If:
- You’ve never closed a real estate deal directly with a seller
- You only have admin, customer service, or lead generation VA experience
- You’re not comfortable cold calling or negotiating pricing
- You don’t understand real estate terms or investment basics
- You can’t work full-time U.S. hours or have unreliable power or internet
- You can not take coaching or accountability for performance

How to Apply: (Read Carefully – Incomplete Applications Will Be Ignored)
- Email us at: Upgrade to see actual info
- Subject line: Real Estate Acquisitions Application – [Your Name]
 - Attach your resume with relevant real estate or sales experience
- Include a 1–2 minute audio or video introduction about yourself and experience. 

Only applicants who follow all instructions will be considered.

Why Work With Us:
- Industry-leading comp structure
- Bonuses for both activity and consistency, no cap for top earners
- Real deals, real support, real growth for career-minded closers
- This is a career opportunity for serious professionals. If you’re a strong real estate closer who knows how to talk to homeowners (sellers) and get contracts signed, we want to hear from you.
